title: Select screen bug?
body: Anyone else not been able to lock in their champ after changing summoner spells? It always seems to happen to me when I change it to ignite.

replies.body:
Well, better select your champ before selecting spells then. :P

If I was getting this bug, then I wouldn't actually notice, because I always select my spells last.

Bug reports go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
